problem_text_cn: 如图,AB为⊙O直径,AD,BC,CD分别切⊙O于点A,B,E．若AD=1,BC=4,则AB的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AD, BC, and CD are tangent to⊙O at points A, B, E respectively. If AD = N_0, BC = N_1, then the value of AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AB为⊙O直径,AD,BC,CD分别切⊙O于点A,B,E,∴∠DAB=∠ABC=90°,AD=DE,CE=BC,∴CD=AD+BC=5,过D作DH⊥BC于H,则四边形ABHD是矩形,∴BH=AD=1,DH=AB,∴CH=3,∴DH=√{CD^{2}-CH^{2}}=√{5^{2}-3^{2}}=4,故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质,勾股定理,矩形的判定和性质,正确的作出辅助线是解题的关键
